FaqDetails.question: What is the theme of Thomso’19?
FaqDetails.answer: The theme for Thomso’19 is “A Gleaming Gala”, a celebration of light.

FaqDetails.question: Are there extra charges for workshops?
FaqDetails.answer: Yes. Visit http://thomso.in/participants/workshop for more details.

FaqDetails.question: How do I get to Roorkee?
FaqDetails.answer: Roorkee is directly connected to several major cities by air, train, and roadways. By Airways: The nearest airport to Roorkee is situated in Dehradun, around 70km away, so one could easily take a taxi or bus to reach Roorkee. By Railways: Trains are one of the easiest ways through which we could reach Roorkee, especially for a long-distance journey. By Roadways: Buses can be obtained either from I.S.B.T. Kashmiri Gate, Delhi or from I.S.B.T. Anand Vihar Ghaziabad. Since the campus is located by side of Delhi-Dehradun highway, travel by taxi or cab is also smooth.

FaqDetails.question: How to register for workshop?
FaqDetails.answer: First of all register yourself for Thomso. After buying the Thomso ticket, you can register for the workshop/s from your profile.For cultural workshops, visit www.thomso.in/events and select the "Cultural Workshop" after which, register yourself for the workshop/s of your choice. For technical workshops, login with your email and then click/tap on the workshop button.

FaqDetails.question: How to reach IIT Roorkee?
FaqDetails.answer: Once you reached Roorkee, the bus station is just a mere 100m away whereas the railway station is just 3 km away from the main gate of IIT Roorkee.

FaqDetails.question: Is personal vehicle allowed inside the campus?
FaqDetails.answer: No, personal vehicles are not allowed inside the campus.

FaqDetails.question: Will there be accommodation facility for me?
FaqDetails.answer: There are many Hostels which would be available for the accommodation, the registration for allotment would be done through Thomso website. Accommodation can be availed only after full payment of the fees.

FaqDetails.question: What’s the climate like? Do I need to bring some winter clothes now?
FaqDetails.answer: The climate during the last week of October is usually chilly with some rainfall likely to occur. During the daytime the weather is warm, however, nights are a little cold. Hence, it is advisable to carry some warm clothes.

FaqDetails.question: From where I can get the latest updates related to Thomso’19?
FaqDetails.answer: You can get the latest updates from our   Facebook page www.facebook.com/thomsoiitroorkee/,   Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/thomso.iitr/ twitter page https://twitter.com/Thomso_IITR .

FaqDetails.question: What is the registration fee for Thomso’19?
FaqDetails.answer: Registration fee is Rs. 2300/- (with accommodation) and Rs. 1800/- (without accommodation). Once paid, fee is non-refundable.

FaqDetails.question: Are there extra charges for pronites?
FaqDetails.answer: No, the registration fees is inclusive of pronites passes also.

FaqDetails.question: Where we can get information for events for Thomso’19?
FaqDetails.answer: Visit www.thomso.in/events for details of all the events and their registration.

FaqDetails.question: What is the date of Thomso’19?
FaqDetails.answer: Thomso'19 is scheduled from 18th to 20th October this year.
